param.name: google_apps_domain
param.label: Google Apps Domain
param.description: The Google Apps domain to get the calendar data from.

param.name: loadJQuery
param.label: Load JQuery
param.description: jQuery is required by this component The only reason not to load it is if it has already been loaded manually or by another module.

param.name: toolTipText
param.label: Event tooltip
param.description: Here you can customize the appearance of the event tooltip.

Here you can modify the event tooltip. The following attributes of an event are provided:
{title}, {description}, {startdate}, {starttime}, {dateseparator}, {enddate}, {endtime} {where}, {backlink}, {link}, {maplink}, {calendarname}, {calendarcolor}
